Address.Address1: Kucukayasofya Mah Sehit Mehmet Pasa Sok.

Description.Text: Rose Garden Suites, are located in Sultanahmet district of Istanbul's which is one of oldest and most precious area. The Rose Garden Suite's have only 13 luxury rooms with a unique design or Turkish architecture. The hotel offers a lovely garden with an 160 years old walnut tree and all roses all around from Turkey. Hotel also provides the facility of Barbecue area, Dry cleaning, Library, Lobby and Car on rent.

Superior Double/Twin Room - Superior Double/Twin offers one double bed or two twin beds with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony / terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite, clothes dryer, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and valet service. This special rooms has been furnished with the best quality of Ottoman Imperial style..The rooms are 24 to 28 sqm2 Each of room has a unique design and sign of the Traditional Turkish architecture The superior rooms have a balcony which is overlooking the lovely Garden.
Superior Single Room - Superior Single Room offers one double bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony / terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite, clothes dryer, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and valet service.This special rooms has been furnished with the best quality of Ottoman Imperial style..The rooms are 24 to 28 sqm2 Each of room has a unique design and sign of the Traditional Turkish architecture The superior rooms have a balcony which is overlooking the lovely garden.
Executive Room with Jacuzzi - Executive Room with Jacuzzi offers one king bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, balcony / terrace, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite, clothes dryer, color TV, en-suite / private bathroom, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, kettle, laundry service, mini bar, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and valet service. This special rooms has been furnished with the best quality of Ottoman Imperial style.. The rooms are 35 sqm2 and each of room has unique design and sign of the.Traditional Turkish architecture Executive Suites have a large sitting area and facing the old city of Istanbul The bathrooms are large enough and have alarge jacuzzi,also all bathrooms have a central heating from the ground as well.
